domain
Class SoundsManager

java.lang.Object
  domain.SoundsManager

public class SoundsManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the responsible of managing the sounds of the game.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class SoundsManager.AudioClipPlayer
          This nested class is the responsible of managing the AudioClip instances.
protected  class SoundsManager.ClipPlayer
          This nested class is the responsible of managing the Clip instances.

          This method is used to get an ClipPlayer instance.

Method Detail

instantiate

public static SoundsManager instantiate()
This method is used to get an SoundsManager instance following the Single-Town model

Returns:
an SoundsManager instance.

loadAudioClip

public void loadAudioClip(java.lang.String soundName,
                          java.net.URL url)
This method loads an AudioClip instance. If the AudioClip can't be loaded, then the audioClips HashMap is unchanged.

Parameters:
soundName - The name that will be assigned to the sound at the audioClips hashmap.
url - The Url instance from wich to get the new AudioClip

loadClip

public void loadClip(java.lang.String soundName,
                     java.io.File file)
This method loads a Clip instance from a given File.

Parameters:
soundName - The key value that the sound will have in the HashMap
file - The File containing audio.

playAudioClip

public void playAudioClip(java.lang.String soundName,
                          boolean looping)
This method plays an AudioClip.

Parameters:
soundName - The key in the audioClips HashMap.
looping - A boolean value determining wether if the sound should be looping.

getAudioClipPlayer

protected SoundsManager.AudioClipPlayer getAudioClipPlayer(java.lang.String soundName)
This method is used to get an AudioClipPlayer instance.

Parameters:
soundName - The key for the desired sound to be managed by the AudioClipPlayer instance.
Returns:
an AudioClipPlayer instance managing the desired AudioClip.

getClipPlayer

protected SoundsManager.ClipPlayer getClipPlayer(java.lang.String soundName)
This method is used to get an ClipPlayer instance.

Parameters:
soundName - The key for the desired Clip to be managed by the ClipPlayer instance.
Returns:
a ClipPlayer instance managing the desired Clip.
